Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style, pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with part of lotus bud in added white outline with added red centre, above single white band; exterior: part of wide black band above trace of second at bottom of sherd (or possibly belly of an animal).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0415) (phase 2)
